statements: SELECT * FROM GreenBuildings;
SELECT building_id, building_name FROM GreenBuildings ORDER BY building_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM GreenBuildings WHERE leed_certification_status = 'Platinum';
SELECT building_name, address FROM GreenBuildings WHERE address LIKE '%Street';
SELECT building_id, building_name, leed_certification_status FROM GreenBuildings ORDER BY leed_certification_status DESC, building_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM GreenBuildings WHERE leed_certification_status = 'Platinum';
SELECT building_name, address FROM GreenBuildings WHERE building_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM GreenBuildings ORDER BY building_name DESC;
SELECT building_id, building_name, leed_certification_status FROM GreenBuildings WHERE address LIKE '%Avenue%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_buildings FROM GreenBuildings WHERE leed_certification_status = 'Gold';
SELECT * FROM green_buildings;
SELECT building_name, certification_status FROM green_buildings WHERE certification_status='LEED';
SELECT building_name, certification_status FROM green_buildings ORDER BY certification_status DESC;
SELECT building_name, certification_status FROM green_buildings WHERE building_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT building_name, certification_status FROM green_buildings JOIN leed_certifications ON green_buildings.building_id = leed_certifications.building_id;
SELECT building_name, certification_status FROM green_buildings;
SELECT * FROM green_buildings ORDER BY building_name DESC;
SELECT gb.building_name, lc.certification_name FROM green_buildings gb JOIN leed_certifications lc ON gb.building_id = lc.building_id;
SELECT certification_name, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM leed_certifications GROUP BY certification_name;
SELECT gb.building_name, lc.certification_name FROM green_buildings gb LEFT JOIN leed_certifications lc ON gb.building_id = lc.building_id WHERE lc.certification_level = 'Gold';
SELECT * FROM Green_Buildings;
SELECT building_name, certification_status FROM Green_Buildings ORDER BY certification_status DESC;
SELECT building_id, building_name FROM Green_Buildings WHERE certification_status = 'Certified';
SELECT * FROM Certification WHERE certification_level IS NOT NULL;

SELECT building_name, certification_name FROM Green_Buildings JOIN Building_Certification ON Green_Buildings.building_id = Building_Certification.building_id JOIN Certification ON Building_Certification.certification_id = Certification.certification_id ORDER BY certification_date DESC;
SELECT building_name, certification_status FROM Green_Buildings;
SELECT certification_name, certification_level FROM Certification;
SELECT * FROM Building_Certification WHERE certification_date > '2021-01-01';

SELECT b.building_name, c.certification_name, bc.certification_date FROM Green_Buildings b JOIN Building_Certification bc ON b.building_id = bc.building_id JOIN Certification c ON bc.certification_id = c.certification_id;

SELECT building_name, certification_name, certification_level FROM Green_Buildings JOIN Building_Certification ON Green_Buildings.building_id = Building_Certification.building_id JOIN Certification ON Building_Certification.certification_id = Certification.certification_id;
SELECT * FROM buildings
SELECT building_name, leed_certification_status FROM buildings
SELECT building_id, building_name, certification_date FROM buildings
SELECT * FROM floors
SELECT building_id, floor_number, area_sqft FROM floors

SELECT buildings.building_name, floors.floor_number, floors.area_sqft FROM buildings JOIN floors ON buildings.building_id = floors.building_id WHERE floors.area_sqft > 10000 ORDER BY buildings.building_name ASC
SELECT building_name, leed_certification_status, certification_date FROM buildings WHERE leed_certification_status = 'Platinum' ORDER BY certification_date DESC
SELECT * FROM leed_categories WHERE LENGTH(description) > 100 ORDER BY category_name ASC

SELECT buildings.building_name, leed_categories.category_name FROM buildings JOIN building_leed_category ON buildings.building_id = building_leed_category.building_id JOIN leed_categories ON building_leed_category.category_id = leed_categories.category_id

SELECT building_name, leed_certification_status, category_name FROM buildings JOIN building_leed_category ON buildings.building_id = building_leed_category.building_id JOIN leed_categories ON building_leed_category.category_id = leed_categories.category_id WHERE leed_certification_status IN ('Gold', 'Platinum') ORDER BY building_name ASC
SELECT * FROM Buildings;
SELECT building_name, city, state FROM Buildings ORDER BY state;
SELECT building_name, address, leed_certification_status FROM Buildings WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT building_name, address, city, state, zip_code FROM Buildings WHERE state = 'CA';
SELECT c.category_name, c.description, cer.certification_date FROM LEEDCategories c JOIN Certifications cer ON c.category_id = cer.category_id;
SELECT * FROM Buildings WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT building_name, address FROM Buildings WHERE state = 'CA' AND zip_code = '90210';
SELECT b.building_name, c.category_name FROM Buildings b INNER JOIN Certifications cert ON b.building_id = cert.building_id INNER JOIN LEEDCategories c ON c.category_id = cert.category_id;
SELECT u.username, ur.role_name FROM Users u INNER JOIN UserRoles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id WHERE u.user_id = 1001;
SELECT building_name, city, state, zip_code FROM Buildings ORDER BY zip_code DESC, state ASC;
